thread.title: Gallery: 16 California firefighters honored at Memorial Ceremony
thread.title_full: Gallery: 16 California firefighters honored at Memorial Ceremony

title: Gallery: 16 California firefighters honored at Memorial Ceremony
text: Local Gallery: 16 California firefighters honored at Memorial Ceremony Firemen honor guards with various fire departments carry the flags to be presented to families who have lost firefighters on Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, at the Capitol Park in Sacramento, Calif. The California Firefighters Memorial ceremony honored the memory of 16 California firefighters and added their names to the limestone California Firefighters Memorial wall at the Capitol Park. Andrew Seng aseng@sacbee.com Firemen honor guards with various fire departments carry the flags to be presented to families who have lost firefighters on Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, at the Capitol Park in Sacramento, Calif. The California Firefighters Memorial ceremony honored the memory of 16 California firefighters and added their names to the limestone California Firefighters Memorial wall at the Capitol Park. The California Firefighters Memorial ceremony honored the memory of 16 California firefighters and added their names to the limestone California Firefighters Memorial wall at the Capitol Park.
